title: Focus on vegetable crops
content: Vegetable crops encompass over 200 plant species utilized as human food. These predominantly herbaceous plants can be consumed raw or cooked, either fresh or preserved, in various forms including leaves, roots, fruits, seeds, flowers, inflorescences, and stems. In addition to providing calories, vegetables also provide various micronutrients for healthy diets to combat hidden hunger. Thus, vegetables together with fruits and legumes are proposed as new generation staple food.
